Title: GCCF, FCoV negative, stunning pedigree, pair only
description:
We are the first cattery in the UK to offer kittens which are FCoV free.

FCoV causes fatal disease FIP, which is the biggest killer of cats and kittens under two years. Our cats are tested and certified clear by Glasgow University Veterinary School. This status is possible due to the Scientific research we have undertaken and  published in conjunction with Dr. Diane Addie
